00042 #define THROW_SITE_INFO(what)                                           \
00043   std::string(std::string(what) + "\n" +                                \
00044               "  in " + std::string(BOOST_CURRENT_FUNCTION) + "\n" +    \
00045               "  at " + std::string(__FILE__) + ":" + BOOST_STRINGIZE(__LINE__) + "\n")
00046 
00047 #define ASSERT_THROW(_x)                                                \
00048   if (not (_x))                                                         \
00049     throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO("assertion failed: " + std::string(#_x))); \
00050   else void(0)

00052 namespace logging {
00053   enum severity_level {
00054     info,
00055     status,
00056     warning,
00057     error
00058   };
00059 
00060   namespace my_keywords {
00061     BOOST_PARAMETER_KEYWORD(time_tag_ns, time_tag);
00062   }
00063 
00064   template< typename BaseT >
00065   class time_tagger_feature : public BaseT {
00066   public:
00067     typedef typename BaseT::char_type char_type;
00068     typedef typename BaseT::threading_model threading_model;
00069 
00070   public:
00071     time_tagger_feature();
00072     time_tagger_feature(time_tagger_feature const& that);
00073     template< typename ArgsT >
00074     time_tagger_feature(ArgsT const& args);
00075 
00076     typedef typename boost::log::strictest_lock<boost::lock_guard<threading_model>,
00077                                              typename BaseT::open_record_lock,
00078                                              typename BaseT::add_attribute_lock,
00079                                              typename BaseT::remove_attribute_lock
00080                                              >::type open_record_lock;
00081 
00082   protected:
00083     template<typename ArgsT>
00084       boost::log::record open_record_unlocked(ArgsT const& args);
00085   } ;
00086 
00087   template< typename BaseT >
00088   time_tagger_feature< BaseT >::time_tagger_feature() {}
00089 
00090   template< typename BaseT >
00091   time_tagger_feature< BaseT >::time_tagger_feature(time_tagger_feature const& that)
00092     : BaseT(static_cast< BaseT const& >(that)) {}
00093 
00094   template< typename BaseT >
00095   template< typename ArgsT >
00096   time_tagger_feature< BaseT >::time_tagger_feature(ArgsT const& args)
00097     : BaseT(args) {}
00098 
00099   template< typename BaseT >
00100   template< typename ArgsT >
00101   boost::log::record time_tagger_feature< BaseT >::open_record_unlocked(ArgsT const& args) {
00102     boost::posix_time::ptime tag_value = args[my_keywords::time_tag | boost::date_time::not_a_date_time];
00103 
00104     // if no time is given use the current universal time
00105     if (tag_value.is_not_a_date_time())
00106       tag_value = boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time();
00107 
00108     boost::log::attribute_set& attrs = BaseT::attributes();
00109     boost::log::attribute_set::iterator tag = attrs.end();
00110 
00111     std::pair<boost::log::attribute_set::iterator, bool>
00112       res = BaseT::add_attribute_unlocked("TimeTag", boost::log::attributes::constant<boost::posix_time::ptime>(tag_value));
00113     if (res.second)
00114       tag = res.first;
00115 
00116     BOOST_SCOPE_EXIT_TPL((&tag)(&attrs)) {
00117       if (tag != attrs.end())
00118         attrs.erase(tag);
00119     }
00120     BOOST_SCOPE_EXIT_END
00121       return BaseT::open_record_unlocked(args);
00122   }
00123 
00124   struct time_tagger : public boost::mpl::quote1<time_tagger_feature> {};
00125 
00127   template<typename LevelT = int>
00128   class severity_timestamp_logger
00129     : public boost::log::sources::basic_composite_logger<
00130     char,
00131     severity_timestamp_logger<LevelT>,
00132     boost::log::sources::multi_thread_model<boost::shared_mutex>,
00133     boost::log::sources::features<boost::log::sources::severity<LevelT>, time_tagger>
00134     > {
00135     BOOST_LOG_FORWARD_LOGGER_MEMBERS_TEMPLATE(severity_timestamp_logger);
00136   };
00137   
00138   void init(std::string path, std::string name);
00139 
00140   BOOST_LOG_GLOBAL_LOGGER(logger, severity_timestamp_logger<severity_level>);
00141 
00142 } // namespace logging

00145 #define LOG_WITH_TIME_TAG(lg, sev, tg)                                  \
00146   BOOST_LOG_WITH_PARAMS((lg), (boost::log::keywords::severity=(sev))(logging::my_keywords::time_tag=(tg)))
00147 
00148 #define LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(lg, sev)                                   \
00149   BOOST_LOG_WITH_PARAMS((lg), (boost::log::keywords::severity=(sev)))
00150 
00151 #define LOGGER_INIT(_path_, _name_) logging::init(_path_, _name_);
00152 
00153 #define LOG_INFO(_message_)                                             \
00154   LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::info)    << _message_;
00155 #define LOG_STATUS(_message_)                                           \
00156   LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::status)  << _message_;
00157 #define LOG_WARNING(_message_)                                          \
00158   LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::warning) << _message_;
00159 #define LOG_ERROR(_message_)                                            \
00160   LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::error)   << _message_;
00161 
00162 // log with timestamp given as argument
00163 #define LOG_INFO_T(_time_,_message_)                                    \
00164   LOG_WITH_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::info,    _time_) << _message_;
00165 #define LOG_STATUS_T(_time_,_message_)                                  \
00166   LOG_WITH_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::status,  _time_) << _message_;
00167 #define LOG_WARNING_T(_time_,_message_)                                 \
00168   LOG_WITH_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::warning, _time_) << _message_;
00169 #define LOG_ERROR_T(_time_,_message_)                                   \
00170   LOG_WITH_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::error,   _time_) << _message_;
00171 
00172 #define LOGGER_INFO    LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::info)
00173 #define LOGGER_STATUS  LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::status)
00174 #define LOGGER_WARNING LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::warning)
00175 #define LOGGER_ERROR   LOG_WITHOUT_TIME_TAG(logging::logger::get(), logging::error)
